topics.body:
Man, digimon is way fucking darker at times than pokemon
!http://i3.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/original/000/760/933/cfc.png!
Scratch that digimon is way darker cause there always is at least one death per episode and unless you're a main character chances are you're not coming back; even then there's a high chance you won't come back.

I still remember wizardmon dying.  Also for some reason any Leomon is pretty much going to die.
